name: tigerishly
content:

in a very determined and strong way: She was tigerishly competitive and thirsty for success. If anyone criticized a member of her team, she would spring tigerishly to their defence.
More examplesFewer examplesWe had to defend tigerishly to hold on to our lead.They fought back tigerishly after a disastrous start to the match.She could veer from being sweet and pleasant to being tigerishly savage.The Australians had to defend tigerishly to stop the New Zealanders from scoring.
